holy_zeal.description: Your zeal intensifies, empowering consecutive strikes.

holy_zeal.name: Smite of Conviction
holy_zeal.description: Your holy strikes burn with unwavering conviction.

divine_protection.name: Sanctified Bulwark
divine_protection.description: Your divine protection strengthens, reducing incoming harm.

radiant_aegis.description: A gentle radiance grants minor healing to allies.

radiant_aegis.name: Beacon of Valor
radiant_aegis.description: Your presence emboldens allies, improving their combat performance.

radiant_aegis.name: Radiant Ward
radiant_aegis.description: Your aura intensifies, shielding allies from harm.

capstone.name: Avatar of the Light
capstone.description: You become a living vessel of divine radiance, smiting foes and shielding allies.

ranged_mastery.name: Piercing Arrow
ranged_mastery.description: Your arrows strike deeper, penetrating enemy defenses.

ranged_mastery.name: Eagle Eye

survival_expertise.name: Ambush Mastery
survival_expertise.description: Your first strike from stealth or distance hits with devastating force.

ceremonial_mastery.description: Your chants align with ritual energies, improving results.

ceremonial_mastery.name: Grand Invocation

capstone.description: Your mastery of circles, symbols, and ceremony produces extraordinary ritual outcomes.

opportunistic_strikes.name: Exploit Opening

capstone.description: You embody pure rot, spreading unstoppable decay with every action.

elemental_channeling.name: Spark of the Storm

elemental_channeling.description: Your mastery of elemental balance amplifies your magic.

ancestral_spirits.name: Whisper of Ancestors
ancestral_spirits.description: You hear faint guidance from ancestral spirits.

ancestral_spirits.description: Ancestral spirits protect you from harm.

ancestral_spirits.name: Ancestral Surge
ancestral_spirits.description: Spirits empower your magic with ancient strength.

primal_rituals.description: A simple ritual that enhances your elemental affinity.

primal_rituals.name: Totemic Focus
primal_rituals.description: Your rituals become more stable and potent.

primal_rituals.name: Primal Convergence
primal_rituals.description: Your rituals call upon multiple primal forces at once.

capstone.name: Avatar of the Storm
capstone.description: You embody the fury of the elements, unleashing devastating primal power.

spatial_distortion.description: You distort space around you, pulling enemies toward collapse.

weapon_mastery.description: Your blows land with greater force and momentum.
